binding:binding.name: Phidgets Binding
binding:binding.description:
Phidgets are a collection of USB devices and sensors created for hobbyists and engineers to prototype or create their own software controlled systems.

Prerequisites:
  • Phidgets library installed (libphidget22)
  • Phidgets java binding installed (libphidget22java)
  • For network discovery, avahi library must be installed (libavahi-client) - optional
See: https://www.phidgets.com/docs/Operating_System_Support

Website: https://www.phidgets.com/
binding:binding.author: Gunnar Skjold

parameter.name: logfile
parameter.label: Log file
parameter.description: The full path to a file where Phidgets library can log internal messages
